name: Knabu Distributed Systems
slogan: We're building a UK Clearing Crypto Bank
description: We’re a blockchain tech company, undergoing our UK clearing bank licence process.  We’ll provide Clearing & Settlement Access to Crypto Businesses.

team.name: Diana Mihaylova
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder of Knabu. I have experience in digital asset trading as well as in sales in various industries spanning from software, AI, Risk & Compliance.

team.name: Janet Akala
team.bioHtml: Janet is a Chartered Accountant with over 17 years’ experience within start-up, SME and tier one regulated organisations.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Gabrielle Patrick
team.bioHtml: The Blockchain Lawyer: UK & US lawyer with 20 years combined business, legal, financial services experience.  Early crypto adopter.  Believer in public good.

team.title: Chief Technology Officer
team.name: Barry MacMahon
team.bioHtml: #BUIDLer. Token Engineer, Cryptographic finance, decentralised application and Bitcoin enthusiast.

jobs.title: Head of Engineering
jobs.description:
Due to continued expansion we are looking to recruit a highly talented Head of Engineering to work on the continuous development of a flagship product using the latest of technologies, whilst working alongside some highly skilled developers. The position requires background from blockchain, DLT, privacy enhancing technologies, distributed systems, and payment system.

Qualifications and Skills

Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or relevant fields
Strong fundamentals in theory and practice
Some experience as a Head of engineer or similar leadership role
Strong leadership and project development skills
Outstanding communication skills (written and verbal)
Experience or familiarity with the cryptocurrency industry (must be investing in cryptocurrencies)
Background from blockchain, DLT, privacy enhancing technologies, distributed systems, and information security
Responsibilities

Oversee all technical operation
In charge of successful development and architecting a payment system
Build and develop a payment system from the ground
Continuously discover and implement new technologies that yield competitive advantage
Update and improve the technical details in the whitepaper and other materials
There will be a token allocation instead of equity like all other team members.

Please send us your CV to apply!
